page.title: 15COLD ASHTON'S HOPES OR FEARS
page.content: In general, people in this area are very{happy}with the life they lead.Most of the area is conservation area which prevents further building. There are two{types of people}- the families who have lived in the area for several generations and the new comers. The former have worries concerning their off- spring being able to find houses in the area at a reasonable price. There are fears about the future of the{Church}in Cold Ashton, which has difficulty in paying its Diocesan Quota. Not only the church goers want to keep the church, nearly all the residents want to see it maintained and used.Some fear the entrance from the{A46}will be lost. This is the only usable access to the village in bad weather.All hope the countryside will remain as unchanged as possible.
